Helper for Theorem 19.6: closure of the convex cone generated by a nonempty polyhedral set is polyhedral.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_polyhedral_closure_convexConeHull_of_polyhedral {d : } {S : Set (Fin d )} (hS_nonempty : S.Nonempty) (hS_polyhedral : IsPolyhedralConvexSet d S) : IsPolyhedralConvexSet d (closure ((ConvexCone.hull S : Set (Fin d )))) := by have hS_conv : Convex S := helperForTheorem_19_1_polyhedral_isConvex (n := d) (C := S) hS_polyhedral have hTFAE : [IsPolyhedralConvexSet d S, (IsClosed S {C' : Set (Fin d ) | IsFace ( := ) S C'}.Finite), IsFinitelyGeneratedConvexSet d S].TFAE := polyhedral_closed_finiteFaces_finitelyGenerated_equiv (n := d) (C := S) hS_conv have hS_fg : IsFinitelyGeneratedConvexSet d S := (hTFAE.out 0 2).1 hS_polyhedral rcases hS_fg with S, S, hSfin, hSfin, hSeq have hMixed_nonempty : (mixedConvexHull (n := d) S S).Nonempty := by rcases hS_nonempty with x, hx refine x, ?_ simpa [hSeq] using hx have hSne : S.Nonempty := helperForTheorem_19_5_pointsNonempty_of_nonempty_mixedConvexHull (n := d) (S := S) (S := S) hMixed_nonempty have hclosure_eq : closure ((ConvexCone.hull S : Set (Fin d ))) = cone d (S S) := by calc closure ((ConvexCone.hull S : Set (Fin d ))) = closure ((ConvexCone.hull (mixedConvexHull (n := d) S S) : Set (Fin d ))) := by simp [hSeq] _ = cone d (S S) := helperForTheorem_19_6_closure_convexConeHull_eq_cone_of_finiteMixedData (d := d) (S := S) (S := S) hSfin hSfin hSne have hcone_poly : IsPolyhedralConvexSet d (cone d (S S)) := helperForTheorem_19_1_cone_polyhedral_of_finite_generators (m := d) (T := S S) (hSfin.union hSfin) simpa [hclosure_eq] using hcone_poly

Helper for Theorem 19.6: transporting convexHull.{u_1, u_2} ( : Type u_1) {E : Type u_2} [Semiring ] [PartialOrder ] [AddCommMonoid E] [Module E] : ClosureOperator (Set E)convexHull of a finite union through the Euclidean coordinate equivalence.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_convexHull_iUnion_image_linearEquiv {n m : } {C : Fin (Nat.succ m) Set (Fin n )} : let eN : (Fin n ) L[] EuclideanSpace (Fin n) := (EuclideanSpace.equiv ( := ) ( := Fin n)).symm let CE : Fin (Nat.succ m) Set (EuclideanSpace (Fin n)) := fun i => eN '' C i eN '' (convexHull ( i, C i)) = convexHull ( i, CE i) := by intro eN CE calc eN '' (convexHull ( i, C i)) = convexHull (eN '' ( i, C i)) := by simpa using (LinearMap.image_convexHull (f := eN.toLinearMap) (s := i, C i)) _ = convexHull ( i, CE i) := by congr 1 simpa [CE] using (Set.image_iUnion (f := eN) (s := fun i => C i))

Helper for Theorem 19.6: additive equivalences commute with finite Minkowski sums.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_image_finsetSum_addEquiv { : Type*} [AddCommMonoid ] [AddCommMonoid ] [Fintype ] (e : + ) (A : Set ) : e '' ( i, A i) = i, (e '' A i) := by classical ext y constructor rintro x, hx, rfl rcases (Set.mem_finset_sum (t := (Finset.univ : Finset )) (f := A) (a := x)).1 hx with z, hzmem, hzsum refine (Set.mem_finset_sum (t := (Finset.univ : Finset )) (f := fun i => e '' A i) (a := e x)).2 ?_ refine fun i => e (z i), ?_, ?_ intro i hi exact z i, hzmem (i := i) hi, rfl simpa using congrArg e hzsum intro hy rcases (Set.mem_finset_sum (t := (Finset.univ : Finset )) (f := fun i => e '' A i) (a := y)).1 hy with z, hzmem, hzsum have hzpre : i, x, x A i e x = z i := by intro i rcases hzmem (i := i) (by simp) with x, hxA, hxz exact x, hxA, hxz choose x hxA hxz using hzpre have hxsum_mem : ( i, x i) i, A i := by refine (Set.mem_finset_sum (t := (Finset.univ : Finset )) (f := A) (a := i, x i)).2 ?_ refine x, ?_, rfl intro i hi exact hxA i refine i, x i, hxsum_mem, ?_ calc e ( i, x i) = i, e (x i) := by simp _ = i, z i := by simp [hxz] _ = y := hzsum

Helper for Theorem 19.6: additive equivalences commute with finite Minkowski sums under preimage.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_preimage_finsetSum_addEquiv { : Type*} [AddCommMonoid ] [AddCommMonoid ] [Fintype ] (e : + ) (A : Set ) : e ' ( i, A i) = i, (e ' A i) := by classical have hpreimage_eq_image : e ' ( i, A i) = e.symm '' ( i, A i) := by ext x constructor intro hx exact e x, hx, by simp rintro y, hy, rfl simpa using hy have hpreimage_eq_image_each : (fun i => e ' A i) = (fun i => e.symm '' A i) := by funext i ext x constructor intro hx exact e x, hx, by simp rintro y, hy, rfl simpa using hy calc e ' ( i, A i) = e.symm '' ( i, A i) := hpreimage_eq_image _ = i, e.symm '' A i := by simpa using (helperForTheorem_19_6_image_finsetSum_addEquiv (e := e.symm) (A := A)) _ = i, e ' A i := by simp [hpreimage_eq_image_each]

Helper for Theorem 19.6: the weighted branch union in the Unknown identifier `tail`tail coordinate transports through the Euclidean coordinate linear equivalence.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_image_weightedUnion_linearEquiv {n m : } {C : Fin (Nat.succ m) Set (Fin n )} (eN : (Fin n ) [] EuclideanSpace (Fin n)) (lam : Fin (Nat.succ m) ) : eN '' ( i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i))) = i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (eN '' C i) else lam i (eN '' (C i))) := by have hbranch : i, eN '' (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i)) = (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (eN '' C i) else lam i (eN '' (C i))) := by intro i by_cases h0 : lam i = 0 simpa [h0] using (recessionCone_image_linearEquiv (e := eN) (C := C i)).symm simp [h0] calc eN '' ( i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i))) = i, eN '' (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i)) := by simpa using (helperForTheorem_19_6_image_finsetSum_addEquiv (e := eN.toAddEquiv) (A := fun i => if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i))) _ = i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (eN '' C i) else lam i (eN '' (C i))) := by simp [hbranch]

Helper for Theorem 19.6: transporting the weighted finite union formula back through a linear equivalence using preimage.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_preimage_weightedUnion_linearEquiv {n m : } {C : Fin (Nat.succ m) Set (Fin n )} (eN : (Fin n ) [] EuclideanSpace (Fin n)) (lam : Fin (Nat.succ m) ) : eN ' ( i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (eN '' C i) else lam i (eN '' (C i)))) = i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i)) := by have himage := helperForTheorem_19_6_image_weightedUnion_linearEquiv (n := n) (m := m) (C := C) (eN := eN) (lam := lam) calc eN ' ( i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (eN '' C i) else lam i (eN '' (C i)))) = eN ' (eN '' ( i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i)))) := by simp [himage] _ = i, (if lam i = 0 then Set.recessionCone (C i) else lam i (C i)) := Set.preimage_image_eq _ eN.injective

Helper for Theorem 19.6: linear equivalences transport convex-cone hulls through set image.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_convexConeHull_image_linearEquiv { : Type*} [AddCommMonoid ] [Module ] [AddCommMonoid ] [Module ] (e : [] ) (s : Set ) : e '' (ConvexCone.hull s : Set ) = (ConvexCone.hull (e '' s) : Set ) := by ext y constructor rintro x, hx, rfl have hs_to : s (ConvexCone.hull (e '' s)).comap e.toLinearMap := by intro x hx exact ConvexCone.subset_hull x, hx, rfl have hhull_to : ConvexCone.hull s (ConvexCone.hull (e '' s)).comap e.toLinearMap := ConvexCone.hull_min hs_to exact hhull_to hx intro hy have himage_subset : e '' s ((ConvexCone.hull s).map e.toLinearMap : Set ) := by rintro y x, hx, rfl exact x, ConvexCone.subset_hull hx, rfl have hhull_image : ConvexCone.hull (e '' s) (ConvexCone.hull s).map e.toLinearMap := ConvexCone.hull_min himage_subset exact hhull_image hy

Helper for Theorem 19.6: after casting Fin.natAdd 1 sorry : Fin (1 + ?m.1)Fin.natAdd 1 Unknown identifier `i`i from Fin (1 + sorry) : TypeFin (1+Unknown identifier `n`n) to Fin (sorry + 1) : TypeFin (Unknown identifier `n`n+1), it coincides with sorry.succ : Fin (?m.1 + 1)Fin.succ Unknown identifier `i`i.

lemma helperForTheorem_19_6_cast_natAdd_one_eq_succ {n : } (i : Fin n) : (Fin.cast (Nat.add_comm 1 n) (Fin.natAdd 1 i) : Fin (n + 1)) = Fin.succ i := by apply Fin.ext simp [Fin.natAdd, Fin.succ, Nat.add_comm]
